channel.title: Adding custom items problem?

item.title: Adding custom items problem?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

There is a missing bracket. Mayby not in this place of code, but look around it. Somewhere there is a missing { or } in that file. Unless you made that big of a list of errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding custom items problem?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Yeah, I’ve added SilentCJ’s dragon platebody and PvP equipment, and after I compiled, there was the 100 errors thing. So I made sure there was a { and } everywhere, and there was. So, I compiled again, and there was the 100 errors. So now I’m just confused. Here’s an example of how they look:

if(i == 13655) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[9]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[9]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10266; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 10275; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 10291; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 10283; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[4] = 4550; class8.anIntArray160[4] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[5] = 10287; class8.anIntArray160[5] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[6] = 8375; class8.anIntArray160[6] = 80; class8.anIntArray156[7] = 8384; class8.anIntArray160[7] = 75; class8.anIntArray156[8] = 8367; class8.anIntArray160[8] = 70; class8.anInt174 = 14083; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 302; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14082;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14082;//female wearing // class8.anInt188 = 14080;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Custom dragon platebody";//Name of the new item }

I tabbed the brackets once, and everything else twice. Was I supposed to do that?

Read full topic
